comment:
* Interface definition for a callback that receives status messages and warnings
     * during registration and rights acquisition.

methods.name: public void onInfo(DrmManagerClient client, DrmInfoEvent event)
methods.comment: * Called when the DRM framework sends status or warning information during registration * and rights acquisition. * * @param client The DrmManagerClient instance. * @param event The {@link DrmInfoEvent} instance that wraps the status information or * warnings.

methodNames: public void onInfo(DrmManagerClient client, DrmInfoEvent event)
